intro: I am determined to realize my dream of building the best websites and contributing to the digital revolution. With strong expertise as a MERN Stack & Next.js Developer, I am passionate about creating visually appealing, scalable, and user-friendly web applications. I bring proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6+), React, Next.js, Node.js, and Express.js, along with hands-on experience in DevOps practices (CI/CD, cloud deployment, containerization) and Database Engineering (MongoDB, SQL).

sections.title: About Me
sections.description: Hi, I'm Uttam Ghosh, a problem-solving-oriented developer with over 2 year's of hands-on experience in building scalable web applications and enjoy working on unique projects.

sections.title: Experience
sections.description: I have gained hands-on experience in web development through professional roles and projects, working with both frontend and backend technologies. My expertise includes JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, along with strong proficiency in Next.js, React.js, and modern UI frameworks. These opportunities have allowed me to strengthen my skills in full-stack development and database management.

sections.title: Education
sections.description: I completed my B.A. from Jhargram Raj College in 2022 and pursued certifications in MERN Stack, Next.js, React, and Web Development. These programs equipped me with strong skills in frontend and full-stack development, enabling me to design scalable, user-friendly, and performance-optimized web applications.

sections.title: Skills
sections.description: I am proficient in Next.js, React.js, Tailwind CSS, ShadCN UI, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS for frontend development, with backend experience in Node.js and Express.js. I work with MongoDB, Git, GitHub, LangChain, Google Gemini API, and Razorpay, applying concepts like CSR, SSR, SSG, REST APIs, and dynamic routing to build scalable, high-performance applications.

sections.title: Projects
sections.description: I have developed projects like an AI-Powered PDF Analyzer, AI Flashcard Generator, AI Interface Studio, Online Ticket Booking System, and an E-commerce platform. These projects demonstrate my expertise in Next.js, React, Node.js, and MongoDB, highlighting my problem-solving skills, API integrations, and ability to build impactful, scalable applications.

sections.title: Contact
sections.description: Feel free to connect with me via LinkedIn, email, or WhatsApp for job opportunities, collaborations, or technical discussions. I'm always open to new challenges and networking.

faqs.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: I have hands-on experience with JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express.js, Next.js, and MongoDB, focusing on building scalable and efficient applications.

faqs.question: Can you tell us about your project experience?
faqs.answer: Sure! I have built projects like an AI-Powered PDF Analyzer, AI Flashcard Generator, Online Ticket Booking System, E-commerce Platform, and AI Interface Studio. These projects showcase my expertise in Next.js, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, ShadCN UI, API integration, and LangChain, highlighting my ability to build scalable, AI-driven, and user-friendly applications.

faqs.question: How can we get in touch with you?
faqs.answer: You can connect with me on LinkedIn, drop me an email, or message me on WhatsApp.

projects.title: AI-Powered PDF Analyzer
projects.description: Engineered a PDF analysis tool to handle 50+ documents/day, reducing manual review time by 30%. Integrated LangChain with Gemini API to generate accurate summaries and optimized responses to deliver insights in under 5 seconds.

projects.title: AI Flashcard Generator
projects.description: Developed a Q&A generator for flashcards supporting 5,000+ character inputs. Enabled export in JSON, PDF, and CSV formats and built a flip-card UI used by 100+ early adopters with 85% positive feedback.

projects.title: Online Ticket Booking System
projects.description: Built an end-to-end booking app integrating 3+ airline APIs for 100+ flight searches/day. Added Razorpay payment integration and reduced booking completion time by 40% through UI optimization and efficient API handling.

projects.title: AI Interface Studio
projects.description: A frontend-only prototype of an AI interaction interface inspired by platforms like OpenAI Playground and LangChain Face Spaces. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS to provide a modern, responsive, and accessible UI.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed a responsive e-commerce application that fetches products from an API, supports filtering, and provides a seamless shopping experience with optimized frontend performance.

projects.title: Grocery bays E-commerce
projects.description: Redesigned website layout for responsiveness, improving mobile experience and reducing bounce rate by 25%.
